__e: Something else I can get kicked off of.
We'd have to be dragged away against our will if you wanted to get rid of us.
Captain. You'll need a host for the next step in the test, to determine whether the creature can be driven from the body.
It was me who kicked them out of our territory.
You do realize your dog has just driven us out of the house.
I can't tell you that, Louis, but I can tell you it was your behavior that drove Tara away, and, if you keep letting your emotions dictate your behavior, you won't need to worry about being replaced.
And when we drive them off, what then?
I guess you must have scared him off to her place.
Thank you for getting him out of here for the day.
Well, maybe they're gone. Maybe you scared them off.
We chased some poor guy out of his home, and all you can say is "Hmm."
As always, we lost the hill and took it back.
The day the Visitors were driven from Earth, never to return.
You're telling me, they drove you off out there?
Where all the wealthy children will get to play once the poor ones have been dispossessed... again.
